Entries.Tue4: Veronica and I have been talking about Lewis's love life recently. We thought he and...#$e#Actually, never mind, it wouldn't be right to say anything more.$s
Entries.summer_Tue4: Veronica and I have been talking about Lewis's love life recently. We thought he and...#$e#Actually, never mind, it wouldn't be right to say anything more.$s

Entries.Wed8_inlaw_Ram: Hi @.#$b#No need to be nervous.$h#$b#Even after everything that happened, I'm glad Robin was able to find some happiness with you.#$b#And it's nice to not have someone complaining about all of the experiments I do at home.$0
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Ram: Robin has a hot temper. It's better to stay on her good side. But I suspect you know that quite well by now.#$e#... Now if we could only quantify her mood levels, perhaps we could model the fluctuations using a sinusoidal curve...$u

Entries.GreenRain: Don't mind me, @. I'm just collecting some samples. This may be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity!$7#$e#Erm... If you see Veronica, can you tell her I'm okay?$7
Entries.married_Sebastian: Congratulations on the marriage. Robin and Veronica have been crying since the wedding. 'Tears of joy', as they call it! A most peculiar concept...#$e#Hmm, now that the basement is unoccupied, I might have to expand the laboratory...$u
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Veronica won't even tell *me* who paid for Pam's new house!#$e#I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...$h

Entries.Fri6: Veronica and Marnie both love animals. Maybe one day I can convince them to run an animal sanctuary with me.#$b#You're welcome to join too @, if you wanted.$u

Changes.LogName: Veronica Dialogue at 6 Hearts for Emily

Entries.Sun6: One of the reasons I love carpentry is because it lets my mind wander.#$b#Even if my thoughts tend to be heavy, when I get out to work with the wood, I can just release my stress and focus on something other than the negativity that likes to weigh me down.#$e#Haha, yeah that last bit sounds like Emily might be rubbing off on me.$2

Entries.Fri4: Veronica asked for me to teach her how to cook. I'm trying the best that I can but I think that it might be a lost cause.$s

Entries.Wed4: It may seem silly to you, but Robin and I actually bonded over our love of goat cheese. That's how we became friends.#$b#Not enough people appreciate it.$u
Entries.summer_Sun6: What should I do on such a warm, lazy day? *sigh*#$e#Any ideas?
Entries.Tue_inlaw_Ram:
I hope you don't mind me stopping by so often. Robin and I have so much fun working on our projects together.
        #$q 44542/44543 former_roomie_followup#%How do you answer?
        	#$r 44542 20 former_roomie_ecstatic#You're welcome anytime!
        	#$r 44542 10 former_roomie_positive#It's no problem.
        	#$r 44543 -10 former_roomie_negative#You come way too often.
Entries.former_roomie_negative: I'm sorry, I'll stop coming by.$s
Entries.former_roomie_followup:
$p 44542
        	#I can't wait to work with Robin on our new project! I'll see you at your place @!$h
        	|Hi @. Don't worry, I won't be stopping by anytime soon.$s

Changes.LogName: Leah Dialogue Addendum Robin is not Spouse

Entries.Sun4: Robin is a great roommate. We often work on carving different pieces of artwork together!$h
Entries.summer_Sun4: Robin is a great roommate. We often work on carving different pieces of artwork together!$h

Entries.winter_Wed: Did you know that Veronica's an animal lover? Whenever she stops by to visit or help Robin work on the farm, the animals are infatuated with her.$h#$b#For a carpenter, she has a surprisingly gentle touch when it comes to animals.

Entries.Mon8: It was hard at first, but now I think we're all a lot happier.$s#$b#Mom and dad hadn't been happy, and even if their divorce was rough on the family, we're all better for it now.$0
Entries.Tue4: Since mom moved out, I've had 30% less broken gadgets and gizmos lying around.$h#$b#She always had a tendency to pick up and play with things she didn't understand how to operate.$0
Entries.fall_21:
I made a custom sander for mom's birthday. 
      	#$q 43447/43448 MRam_bday_followup#Do you think she'll like it, @?
      	#$r 43447 10 MRam_bday_yes#Yes
      	#$r 43448 0 MRam_bday_no#No
Entries.MRam_bday_no: Oh no, should I have done something else?$s
Entries.MRam_bday_followup:
$p 43447
      		#Mom really loved that sander, but what am I supposed to do to top that this year?$s
      		|I made mom a custom sander for her birthday before, but what am I supposed to do this year?$s
Entries.fall_Tue8: @, I just love how the trees look right now!#$e#I know you like them too.
Entries.Tue4_inlaw_Ram: It's strange to have a stepparent now. I guess this must be how Sebastian felt for so long.$s

Entries.GreenRain: I want to go collect samples with my dad, but my Mom called and is insisting we stay here...

Entries.Tue4_inlaw_Ram: When you moved to town, I couldn't have ever imagined we'd be part of the same family.#$b#But you're really kind, and look after so many people -- especially me and mom.#$b#Thanks for being so kind to us, dad.$h^Thanks for being so kind to us, mom.
Entries.winter_Thu: Hey! What's up?#$e#It's a good time to explore the caves.#$e#Maybe I could come with you sometime? It could be fun.#$b#Just don't let mom find out.
Entries.summer_Sun6: Some day I'm going to be a world-class inventor.$u#$e#You're lucky to be related to me!#$b#...just kidding.
Entries.fall_Fri6: Sebastian asked me for help the other day on a project he was working on.#$b#I know. I couldn't believe it either.$h

Entries.fall_Tue8: Veronica kept asking me if I liked a certain someone. When I asked her the same thing, she clammed up and started polishing the counter.$u

Entries.Mon2: Why does everyone ask how I'm doing? Do they not realize I've had my parents split up once before?$a
Entries.Mon8:
Hey @.
					#$q 37155/37156 secretSebquestion_followup#Can I trust you with a secret?
					#$r 37155 10 secretSeb_listen#Yes
					#$r 37156 0 secretSeb_reject#No
Entries.secretSeb_listen: Demetrius is a really nice guy. Even though he's divorced from mom, he treats me like he treats Maru.$u
Entries.secretSebquestion_followup:
$p 37155
										#I got Demetrius to test out one of the programs I'd written. Compared to mom, there was way less trouble involved.
										|Hey, @.$s
Entries.Fri6: Mom moving out is such a pain. Now every-time she has a computer problem, I have to go all the way over to Leah's to fix it.$a#$b#And if you thought maybe I should try helping her over the phone, then I suggest you give that a try yourself and see how well it goes.$h
Entries.Thu8_inlaw_Ram: I guess you're technically my stepdad now. That's...odd.$a^I guess you're technically my stepmom now. That's...odd.$a

Entries.GreenRain: My mom called and is freaking out, but I'm actually kind of enjoying this. I bet the frogs are going wild out there!$h#$e#I'm gonna stay here to try and keep her calm, though.

Entries.Thu8_inlaw_Ram: Mom doesn't nag me near as much as she did before you two were married. You must be doing something right.$h
Entries.winter_Tue6: I was just remembering that time that I nearly screamed at mom for throwing away my old comic collection.#$b#Seems like a long time ago.#$e#Since you married mom, I haven't had to worry about things like that.#$b#She communicates better and I don't yell as often.#$b#It's... nice.$h

Do you remember when I told you about mom throwing away my old comic collection?#$b#Well, it was awhile ago. But what's important is that they showed up out of the blue the other day.#$b#I think Maru may have grabbed them from the trash and kept them safe for me.#$b#Even if she's not saying anything about it.$s
Entries.winter_Thu6: I should learn how to cook. That would be useful.#$b#Do you think you could teach me a couple meals, @? I'd ask mom, but...#$b#I think it'd be easier to learn from you.
Entries.fall_Mon4: You're probably making a lot of money on your farm, huh?#$e#I guess I should get a job soon...$s#$b#If you ever want to create a digital marketplace for your farm, I'd be happy to run it for you.$0

Entries.Demetrius_y2: Gatherings like this give a sense of identity to our community.#$b#Or as Robin used to say... 'it makes the town lively'!

Entries.Tue4_inlaw_Ram: When you moved to town, I couldn't have ever imagined we'd be part of the same family.#$b#But you're really kind, and look after so many people -- especially me and mom.#$b#Thanks for being so kind to us. I'm glad to call you my {{ParentNoun}}.

Entries.Thu8_inlaw_Ram: I guess you're technically my step-{{ParentNoun}} now. That's...odd.$a

Changes.BirthMessage_Adoption: During the night, the adoption agency dropped off your new baby {0}.
Changes.BirthMessage_PlayerMother: During the night, you gave birth to a baby {0}.
Changes.BirthMessage_SpouseMother: During the night, {1} gave birth to a baby {0}.
Changes.HavePlayerBabyQuestion: Do you want to have a baby with {0}?
Changes.HavePlayerBabyQuestion_Adoption: Do you want to adopt a baby with {0}?
Changes.NewChild_SecondChild1: Just look at our little family... We've come a long way, haven't we?
Changes.NewChild_SecondChild2: Two beautiful children... We've come a long way, haven't we?
Changes.NewChild_Adoption: It's so wonderful to welcome little {0} into our life.
Changes.NewChild_FirstChild: Everything went well, and now little {0} is part of the family. We're very fortunate.
Changes.Spouse_KitchenBlocked: You've got a bunch of your stuff blocking the kitchen... I guess you're not getting dinner tonight.$a
Changes.Spouse_MonstersInHouse: Um... Honey? Why are there monsters in the house?
Changes.Farm_RobinWorking_ReadyTomorrow: Your new {0} will be finished tomorrow! I bet you and Robin are pretty excited!
Changes.Farm_RobinWorking1: Your new {0} will be ready in {1} days. Do you mind if I stay for dinner tonight?
Changes.Farm_RobinWorking2: Your new {0} will be ready in {1} days. I'm going to be working on this thing day and night!
Changes.Robin_HouseUpgrade_Accepted: Thank you! I'll get started tomorrow. I should be finished in around three days.
Changes.Robin_PamUpgrade_Accepted: That's so generous of you! I'll start working on the upgrade tomorrow. It should take around three days.
Changes.Mines_PlayerKilled_Robin: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. Robin was on the verge of tears when you didn't come home.#$b#She asked me to search the mines to make sure you were okay.#$b#Be a little more careful next time, for both of your sakes, okay?$s
Changes.Mines_PlayerKilled_Maru_Spouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. You were gone so long I started to get worried about you!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Changes.Mines_PlayerKilled_Maru_NotSpouse: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. I was hunting for minerals and I almost stepped on your head!#$b#Be a little more careful next time, okay?$s
Changes.Robin_UpgradeConstruction_Festival: Okay, I'll start working on your {1} upgrade the day after tomorrow. I always take festivals off.$h
Changes.Robin_UpgradeConstruction: Okay, I'll start working on your {1} upgrade first thing tomorrow morning!$h
Changes.Robin_NewConstruction_Festival: Okay, I'll start working on your new {0} the day after tomorrow. I always take festivals off.$h
Changes.Robin_NewConstruction: Okay, I'll start working on your new {0} first thing tomorrow morning!$h
Changes.Robin_Instant: This {0} is pre-fabricated, so there's no construction time! Convenient, isn't it?$h
Changes.Event.cs.1499: Hey, @. I'm your secret gift-giver this year.#$b#Here, open it.$h
Changes.Event.cs.1500: It's not much, but I hope you like it.$h
Changes.Event.cs.1501: Hi. So, I'm your secret gift-giver this year.#$b#Well? Open it!
Changes.Event.cs.1818: Hmm... I see you laying on a cot... It looks like a hospital. {0} is there to keep you company while you recover. What a nice friend.
Changes.Event.cs.1820: Ahh... Indeed. I see you in a room, having a conversation with a man.
Changes.Event.cs.1821: Ahh... Indeed. I see you in a room, having a conversation with a lady.
Changes.Event.cs.1823: ..  Oh! It's {0}. You seem to be close friends.
Changes.Event.cs.1825: Hmm... I see you sitting in a plush chair by the fire... you're surrounded by luxury, yet filled with lonely desperation.
Changes.Event.cs.1826: ...Oh? It seems you'll be leaving more than a few heartbroken... Are you playing games with those who put their trust in you? Hmm...
Changes.Event.cs.1827: Now I see you and {0} in a field of grass. You seem happy.
Changes.Event.cs.1829: Now I see you and {0} in a dimly lit room. You look serious... but not unhappy. Something important must be happening.
Changes.Event.cs.1831: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young man. He looks a little bashful, but happy to be with you.
Changes.Event.cs.1832: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young man. He looks quite hopeful, and eager to spend time with you.
Changes.Event.cs.1833: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks a little bashful, but happy to be with you.
Changes.Event.cs.1834: Ooo... It's dark, and I see you and a certain young lady. She looks quite hopeful, and eager to spend time with you.
Changes.Event.cs.1837: Hmmm... now what's this young man's name? ... I believe it starts with an '{0}'.
Changes.Event.cs.1838: Hmmm... now what's this young lady's name? ... I believe it starts with an '{0}'.
Changes.Event.cs.1843: Interesting... I see you and {0} working together on a farm. You seem very pleased about something.
Changes.Event.cs.1845: Now I see you, middle-aged, walking through town at dusk. You pause at a window to see a family having dinner. You hang your head and hurry off into the darkness.
Changes.Event.cs.1846: The crystal ball has moved on... Now I see you harvesting a plump, ripe melon. You're on a wonderful looking farm, bursting with life!
Changes.Event.cs.1847: The crystal ball has moved on... I see you somewhere dark... but there you are, inspecting a marvelous gemstone! It's glittering in the light of a small lantern.
Changes.Event.cs.1848: The crystal ball has moved on... AH! You're in combat! There's something dreadful bearing down on you from the dark, but you seem more than ready to face it.
Changes.Event.cs.1849: The crystal ball has moved on... Now I see you relaxing on the riverbanks, holding a fishing pole. Oh! Looks like something big is on the line!
Changes.Event.cs.1850: The crystal ball has moved on... It's you... in the forest. You spot some rare and delicious mushrooms hidden beneath a clump of grass... what a find!
Changes.Event.cs.1851: The crystal ball has moved on... I see you in a golden room... grinning about something. Oh, I see... You're playing some kind of game and you just can't lose!
Changes.Event.cs.1852: Ah... the crystal ball has gone dim. That's all I can do for you, young one.
Changes.Event.cs.1853: Now, just keep in mind that the future isn't set in stone! Whatever I've told you today can still be changed, if you set your heart on it. Farewell.
Changes.Game1.cs.2782: The wedding was wonderful... wasn't it, dear?$h#$e#Well, we can't forget about the farm... time to get to work.
Changes.NPC.cs.3926: Be patient, I still have a lot of work to do. If Robin were to help out, it might be done a little quicker.
Changes.NPC.cs.3927: Your house should be ready tomorrow. I'm sure you and Robin are eager to have the place to yourself again.
Changes.NPC.cs.4274: You remembered my birthday? I'm impressed. Thanks.$h
Changes.NPC.cs.4275: A birthday gift? That's very kind of you! I love it.$h
Changes.NPC.cs.4276: Oh, is it my birthday today? I guess it is. Thanks. This is nice.$h/Oh, is it my birthday today? I guess it is. Thanks. This is nice.$h
Changes.NPC.cs.4277: You remembered my birthday! Thank you. This is great.$h
Changes.NPC.cs.4278: It's my birthday and you give me this? Is this some kind of joke?$s/It's my birthday and you give me this? Is this some kind of joke?$s
Changes.NPC.cs.4279: Oh... It's for my birthday? ... Thanks.$s/Oh... It's for my birthday? ... Thanks.$s
Changes.NPC.cs.4281: Oh, a birthday gift! Thank you./Oh, a birthday gift! Thank you.
Changes.NPC.cs.4406: I just feel like sleeping today.$a
Changes.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Changes.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and %spouse in the bonds of marriage.
Changes.Utility.cs.5370: Well, let's get right to it!
Changes.Utility.cs.5371: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and... well, husband!$h
Changes.Utility.cs.5373: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Changes.Utility.cs.5375: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and... well, wife!$h
Changes.Utility.cs.5377: @... %spouse... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and husband!$h
Changes.Utility.cs.5381: Life is going to be different from now on...
